1.name: Condemn
1.details:
Every 3rd basic attack of Vincas condemns the target, dealing additional physical damage (scaling with physical power).

When nearby large minion, monster or enemy Hero dies, a Spirit Blade will be spawned.

Vincas can pick up a Spirit Blade to trigger Condemn on his next basic attack.

It is possible to pick up to 3 Spirit Blades, but Vincas can only use 1 for each basic attack.

2.name: Double Slash
2.details:
Vincas’s next basic attack within a few seconds hits the target twice.

When Vincas kills an enemy with Double Slash, a Spirit Blade will spawn on top of that unit.

3.name: Blade Work
3.details:
Vincas summons a Spirit Blade in a target location.

Within a short while, Vincas gains increased movement speed towards nearby Spirit Blades.

4.name: Blade Surge
4.details:
Vincas dashes to a Spirit Blade and picks it up.

Within a few seconds, Vincas's next basic attack will dash to the target enemy, dealing Condemn's damage and gains increased attack speed for next 3 basic attacks.

5.name: Blade Storm
5.details:
Vincas dashes to a target location, drawing all the nearby Spirit Blades to him.

The initial dash will take off all Spirit Blades on him and deal the combined damage straight away.

Each Spirit Blade will inflict Condemn as true damage to all enemies hit by Blade Storm.
